texts.text: Greetings. I am a DEMON.
I am here to ask a favour of you.
You see, I require HUMAN SOULS...
To power my HELLFIRE LAWNMOWER.
And then... THEN...
I'll be the talk of the goddamn town.
So, you wanna help me out?
YOU! YOU!!!
Listen you have got to help me.
We are sooo short staffed down at the office in
hell.
We need RECRUITS!! And if you don't help me find some...
I'll lose my job! PLEASE!! I'M BEGGING YOU!!!
YOU HAVE BEEN MAKING DEALS.
YOU WILL OFFER HUMAN SOULS.
IN EXCHANGE FOR A CHANCE TO CONTINUE.
THIS IS NOT AN UNFAIR DEAL.
IF YOU FAIL... YOUR TIME WILL BE CUT SHORT.
CHOOSE WISELY.
My LAWNMOWER would get PUMPED UP from a soul that's <loves> and <likes>. Maybe even <special>, too.
It would be so awesome if you got me a <loves> and <likes> soul. I'll throw in bonus points for <special>.
You have GOT to get my LAWNMOWER a soul that's <loves>, but no way will I take a <hates> one...
I'm feeling something <loves>... But I would NOT want to see ANYTHING that's <hates> right now.
Please. Please. I need someone who's <loves> and <likes>. Please...
Someone <loves> and <likes> would be GREAT for out work environment...
Someone <loves>, but not <hates>! That's what the boss is looking for!
PLEASE... I need someone <loves>... But if they're <hates> my boss will KILL me! LITERALLY!!
IT MUST BE <loves>. IT MUST BE <likes>.
BRING ONE THAT IS <loves>, BUT ALSO <likes>.
IT MUST BE <loves>. IT MUST NOT BE <hates>.
ONE THAT IS <loves>, ONE THAT IS NOT <hates>. BRING THIS.
YES. YOU MAY CONTINUE.
THIS IS UNACCEPTABLE. YOUR EXPERIENCE ENDS.
This right here... Is PERFECT LAWNMOWER FUEL... Thank you so much.
Oh my LAWNMOWER is gonna love this.
Thanks dude. Alright!!
What the hell, man? What the hell is this?
What's your problem? You wanna KILL my LAWNMOWER? Huh? Whatever...
YES! THANK YOU!! THEY'RE PERFECT!!
This is GREAT... YES!
Good! Good! Yeah! They'll do!
NO!!! THAT'S WRONG!!! THAT'S NOT THE KIND OF PERSON I WANTED AT ALL!!!
Do you want me to lose my job? Is that it. I see how it is.
